00021 template <class T, class L, int nTimeout> class CDefaultResourceEditor;

00023 template<class T, class L, int nTimeout=(20/portTICK_RATE_MS)>
00024 class CSharedResource {
00025 public:
00026        class IResourceEditor {
00027        public:
00028               virtual T GetResource(T &resource, void *pParams=NULL) =0;
00029               virtual void SetResource(T &resource, const T &value, void *pParams=NULL) =0;
00030 
00031               virtual void OnDetach(CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout> &formResource) {};
00032               virtual void OnTimeOut(CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout> &formResource) {};
00033        };
00034 
00035 private:
00036        static CDefaultResourceEditor<T, L, nTimeout> s_defaultResourceEditor;
00037 
00038        L m_look;
00039        T m_resouce;
00040 
00041        IResourceEditor *m_pEditor;
00042 
00043 public:
00044 
00045        CSharedResource() {
00046               m_pEditor = NULL;
00047               m_look.Create();
00048               SetEditor(&s_defaultResourceEditor);
00049        }
00050 
00051        virtual ~CSharedResource() {
00052               if (m_pEditor != NULL)
00053                      m_pEditor->OnDetach(*this);
00054        };
00055 
00056        void SetEditor(IResourceEditor *pEditor);
00057 
00058        T GetResource(void *pParams=NULL);
00059        void SetResource(const T &value, void *pParams=NULL);
00060 
00061        inline CSharedResource<T,L,nTimeout> &operator=(const T &value) {
00062               SetResource(value);
00063               return *this;
00064        }
00065 
00066        inline operator T() { return GetResource(); }
00067 };

00073 template<class T, class L, int nTimeout>
00074 class CDefaultResourceEditor: public CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout>::IResourceEditor {
00075 public:
00076        inline T GetResource(T &resource, void *pParams=NULL) { return resource; }
00077        inline void SetResource(T &resource, const T &value, void *pParams=NULL) { resource = value; }
00078 };

00080 template<class T, class L, int nTimeout>
00081 CDefaultResourceEditor<T, L, nTimeout> CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout>::s_defaultResourceEditor;

00083 // Class CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout> implementation
00084 // ----------------------------------------------------
00085 
00086 template<class T, class L, int nTimeout>
00087 void CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout>::SetEditor(IResourceEditor *pEditor) {
00088        // Detach previous delegate if one;
00089        if (m_pEditor != NULL)
00090               m_pEditor->OnDetach(*this);
00091 
00092        m_pEditor = pEditor;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template<class T, class L, int nTimeout>
00096 T CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout>::GetResource(void *pParams) {
00097        assert(m_pEditor != NULL);
00098 
00099        T value;
00100        if (m_look.Take(nTimeout) == pdTRUE) {
00101               value = m_pEditor->GetResource(m_resouce, pParams);
00102               m_look.Give();
00103        }
00104        else {
00105               m_pEditor->OnTimeOut(*this);
00106        }
00107 
00108        return value;
00109 }
00110 
00111 template<class T, class L, int nTimeout>
00112 void CSharedResource<T, L, nTimeout>::SetResource(const T &value, void *pParams) {
00113        assert(m_pEditor != NULL);
00114 
00115        if (m_look.Take(nTimeout) == pdTRUE) {
00116               m_pEditor->SetResource(m_resouce, value, pParams);
00117               m_look.Give();
00118        }
00119        else {
00120               m_pEditor->OnTimeOut(*this);
00121        }
00122 }
